sn11.5:1.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkaṁ devānamindaṁ etadavoca:
sn11.5:1.6: Atha kho, bhikkhave, devā ca asurā ca pārisajje ṭhapesuṁ:
sn11.5:1.8: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkaṁ devānamindaṁ etadavoca:
sn11.5:1.10: Evaṁ vutte, bhikkhave, sakko devānamindo vepacittiṁ asurindaṁ etadavoca:
sn11.5:1.13: Evaṁ vutte, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn11.5:3.1: Bhāsitāya kho pana, bhikkhave, vepacittinā asurindena gāthāya asurā anumodiṁsu, devā tuṇhī ahesuṁ.
sn11.5:3.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkaṁ devānamindaṁ etadavoca:
sn11.5:3.4: Evaṁ vutte, bhikkhave, sakko devānamindo imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn11.5:5.1: Bhāsitāya kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkena devānamindena gāthāya, devā anumodiṁsu, asurā tuṇhī ahesuṁ.
sn11.5:5.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devānamindo vepacittiṁ asurindaṁ etadavoca:
sn11.5:5.4: Evaṁ vutte, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn11.5:7.1: Bhāsitāya kho pana, bhikkhave, vepacittinā asurindena gāthāya asurā anumodiṁsu, devā tuṇhī ahesuṁ.
sn11.5:7.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkaṁ devānamindaṁ etadavoca:
sn11.5:7.4: Evaṁ vutte, bhikkhave, sakko devānamindo imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
sn11.5:14.1: Bhāsitāsu kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkena devānamindena gāthāsu, devā anumodiṁsu, asurā tuṇhī ahesuṁ.
sn11.5:14.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, devānañca asurānañca pārisajjā etadavocuṁ:
sn11.5:14.4: Tā ca kho sadaṇḍāvacarā sasatthāvacarā, iti bhaṇḍanaṁ iti viggaho iti kalaho.
sn11.5:14.6: Tā ca kho adaṇḍāvacarā asatthāvacarā, iti abhaṇḍanaṁ iti aviggaho iti akalaho.
sn11.5:14.8: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sakkassa devānamindassa subhāsitena jayo ahosī”ti.
